problem.markdown:
1. What is the depth of the notch?
(x) 2 mm () 6 mm () 4 mm () 8 mm
2. In the Izod impact test, the angle at which the pendulum is placed from the ground is______ degrees.
() 130 () 100 (x) 90 () 110
3. According to IS codes dimensions, the length of the test piece is _____.
() 65mm () 85mm (x) 75mm () 55mm
4. The initial energy of the hammer is
() 186 Joules () 192 Joules (x) 164 Joules () 138 Joules
5. What property of the metal is used to check in this test?
() Ductility () Brittleness (x) Toughness () Malleability
problem.p: 1. What is the depth of the notch?
2. In the Izod impact test, the angle at which the pendulum is placed from the ground is______ degrees.
3. According to IS codes dimensions, the length of the test piece is _____.
